text: @GavinNewsom don’t be pressured by trump to reopen, we’re not sacrificial lambs for his re-election. trump’s own coronavirus task force guidelines to reopen haven’t been met, tests aren’t available, all that’s available are hundreds of thousands of body bags for trump’s disposable workforce https://t.co/9eXBmU6Lke
